document.docAuthor: Shih, Hsi-Te, Lee, Jung-Hsiang, Ho, Ping-Ho, Liu, Hung-Chang, Wang, Chia-Hsiang, Suzuki, Hiroshi & Teng, Shao-Jyun
document.masterDocTitle: Species diversity of fiddler crabs, genus Uca Leach, 1814 (Crustacea: Ocypodidae), from Taiwan and adjacent islands, with notes on the Japanese species

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Species diversity of fiddler crabs, genus Uca Leach, 1814 (Crustacea: Ocypodidae), from Taiwan and adjacent islands, with notes on the Japanese species

subSubSection.paragraph: Gelasimus perplexus H. Milne Edwards 1852 : 150, pl. 4(18) [type locality: Java].

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Uca ( Celuca ) lactea lactea
—
Sakai 1976a : 608
(part);
Wang, 1984 : 42
(not
Ocypode ( Gelasimus ) lactea De Haan, 1835
).

Uca lactea perplexa
—
Fukui et al. 1989
: 227
; Chen 2001: 208, 1 unnumbered fig.;
Nakasone & Irei 2003 : 269
, fig. 31F.

Uca ( Paraleptuca ) perplexa
—Ng et al. 2008: 241 [list];
Toyota & Seki 2014 : 226
, 4 unnumbered figs.

Uca ( Austruca ) perplexa
—
Naderloo et al. 2010
: 24
, figs. 16a–g, 17a, b, 18c–f.

subSubSection.paragraph:
Material examined
.
Taiwan
: 1 ♂ ( 13.5 mm ) (NCHUZOOL 14647), Lanyang R. estuary, Yilan ,
25 July 2004
; 4 ♂♂ ( 16.6–17.6 mm ) (NCHUZOOL 14677),
1 ♀ ( 13.7 mm ) (NCHUZOOL 14643), Yanshuei R. estuary, Tainan , coll. J.- H. Lee et al. ,
4 Aug. 2009
; 2 ♂♂ (14.4, 15.6 mm ),
1 ♀ ( 14.5 mm ) (NCHUZOOL 14637), Dingtouer Shoal , Cigu , Tainan , coll. J.- H. Lee ,
14 Aug. 2009
; 2 ♂♂ (14.3, 17.2 mm ),
1 ♀ ( 15.7 mm ) (NCHUZOOL 14645), Gaoping R. estuary, Kaohsiung , coll. H.- T. Shih ,
29 Apr. 1998
; 1 ♂ ( 14.5 mm ),
1 ♀ (12.0 mm) (NCHUZOOL 14640), Dapengwan , Pingtung ,
20 July 2007
; 2 ♂♂ (9.3, 11.8 mm ), 1 ♀ ( 12.9 mm ) (NCHUZOOL 13252),
1 ♂ ( 10.6 mm ) (NCHUZOOL 13253), Baoli R. estuary, Pingtung , coll. H.- T. Shih ,
7 July 2001
; 1 ♂ (14.0 mm),
1 ♀ ( 12.1 mm ) (NCHUZOOL 14641), Fengcueisha , Kenting , Pingtung ,
18 May 2001
;
3 ♂♂ ( 14.2–17.2 mm ) ( NTOU ), Dulanwan , Taitung , coll. P.- H. Ho ,
7 Apr. 2001
.
Penghu Islands
: 1 ♂ ( 20.7 mm ) (NCHUZOOL 14662), Citou , coll. H.- T. Shih ,
17 Aug. 1996
; 1 ♂ ( 15.1 mm ) (NCHUZOOL 14675), Shihcyuan, 21 June 2006 ; 2 ♂♂ (13.3, 16.5 mm ) (NCHUZOOL 14639), Chihsi, Siyu, 18 May 2007 ; 3 ♂♂ ( 15.8–16.4 mm ) (NCHUZOOL 14649), Chihsi, Siyu, 19 May 2007 .
Dongsha Island
: 3 ♂♂ ( 12.2–17.5 mm )
, 2 ♀♀ (10.4, 15.1 mm ), coll. C.-Y. Chung & Y.-H. Huang, 7 June 2011 ; 1 ♂ ( 16.6 mm ) (NCHUZOOL 14651), 19 Nov. 2011 ; 1 ♂ ( 17.6 mm ) (NCHUZOOL 14644), 26 May 2012 .
Ryukyus
: 1 ♂ ( 15.8 mm ) (NCHUZOOL 14652), Oura Bay , Okinawa ,
13 Nov. 1975
; 3 ♂♂ ( 9.6– 15.1 mm ),
1 ♀ ( 7.9 mm ) (NCHUZOOL 14654), Yuhi R. , Okinawa ,
19 Mar. 1992
; 1 ♂ ( 7.1 mm ),
2 ♀♀ (6.5, 10.6 mm ) (NCHUZOOL 14650), Okinawa ,
9 July 2009
;
4 ♂♂ (11.0– 14.2 mm ) (NCHUZOOL 14642), Sashiki , Okinawa ,
28 Dec. 2011
; 2 ♂♂ (13.4, 16.2 mm ) (NCHUZOOL 14752), Nagura, Ishigaki, coll. T. Naruse, 23 June 2004 .

Distribution. Widely distributed in the western Pacific (Ryukyus, Taiwan [including Penghu and Dongsha], Philippines , New Guinea , Australia , New Caledonia , Indonesia , Borneo, Peninsular Malaysia , Thailand , Cambodia ), eastern Indian Ocean ( Nicobar Islands ), western and central Pacific Ocean.

Remarks. See Remarks under
U. lactea
for the morphological comparison between
U. lactea
and
U. perplexa
, and Discussion for the distribution of
U. perplexa
in Japan .
